message.content:
To identify and extract the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life from the provided cash flow statement, we should look for the line item that represents depreciation.

In the problem provided, we can see the following section under "Cash Flow From Operating Activities":

```
| Depreciation  | 92870.67 | 2024-02-05 |
```

The "Depreciation" line item has the amount of **92870.67**. This represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life.

Thus, I will structure the answer in the required JSON format:

```json
{"solution": {'value': '92870.67'} }
```
